hero.spaceStartsDescription: We produce 3D printers, IoVIT modems and satellites

cards.text: The production of large-sized and industrial 3D printers and printing for space, med and deep tech industries
Creation of IoT infrastructure and satellite data transmission independent of mobile network coverage
Space Commercial Unified Blockchain System provide anonymous messaging for blockchain and IoT applications

about.title: About us
about.text: Startup company providing innovative solutions for industrial technologies, from additive installations to telecommunications

lists.title: Expertise
lists.text: By choosing us, you trust a wide range of specialists

lists.title: Customer focus
lists.text: You can contact us for any questions within 3 months

lists.title: Experience
lists.text: We have been successfully providing our services for more than 3 years

problemsSection.title: Challenges
problems: Production halted due to broken part and lack of technical support
Limited network coverage, high costs, and data unavailability across wide distances
Data unavailability across wide distances, lack of info for remote military & civil operations, and the need for constant monitoring of resources
solutions: In-house industrial 3D printers with rapid replacement and technical support
Expanded network coverage, affordable pricing with high quality, and a comprehensive Satellite IoT service featuring regional sensors and data processing algorithms
Cloud data availability with API for data processing and the launch of CIS Insurance company for risk reassurance

modeling.title: 3D Modeling
modeling.subtitle: Reverse Engineering
modeling.description: Ensure the process of developing design documentation based on the original data obtained as a finished product sample. Create a technical model with calculations in the shortest possible time. Providing a sample – Drawing development – Prototype

fdm.subtitle: FDM – sequential layering of layers of thermoplastic

sla.subtitle: SLA - uses a photopolymer in liquid form

approbation.title: Testing
approbation.description: Conduct the process of testing to check and assess the effectiveness and practical applicability of the obtained product. All information obtained during testing will help us draw conclusions about the feasibility of further use of the new approach or product

printing.btn: Will materialize any of your fantasies

testimonialsSection.testimonial1: Dear representatives of the Space Lab organization, I would like to express my sincere gratitude for the production of a 3D printer for our order. We are fully satisfied with the quality and functionality of the received equipment. I especially want to mention your team of engineers, who always responded promptly to our questions and always remained open to discuss any ideas.

contactSection.heading: If you have any questions please fill out the form and we will contact you

heroSection.title: Satellite-Internet-of-Very-Important-Things (S-IoVIT)
heroSection.subtitle: Connecting Earth's Vital Data with Space

aboutSection.heading: About S-IoVIT
aboutSection.description: Experience reliable data transfer for IoT applications from critical infrastructures worldwide. Our satellite-based system ensures efficient monitoring of climate, environment, and resources
bullets: Strategic infrastructure that needs to be controlled each moment
For those whose business depends on data
Device that will survive even the most hardcore situations

advantageSection.heading: Why Choose S-IoVIT?
items: Collect data up to 10 km via LoRa, Wi-Fi, Ethernet
Secure blockchain node for data protection and verification
Global data transmission from and to any location

items.title: Letter of Intent with TransTelecom for 5000 devices
items.description: TransTelecom has shown interest in acquiring 5000 S-IoVIT devices, marking a significant step towards realizing our mission

items.title: Launching Sales in Central Asia
items.description: We are excited to introduce S-IoVIT in Central Asia, providing reliable data transfer solutions to the region's critical infrastructures

items.title: Expanding to Middle East, East Asia, and Lat Am
items.description: Our expansion journey continues as we bring S-IoVIT to the Middle East, East Asia, and Latin America to serve more clients

items.title: Launching IoT Satellite Constellation
items.description: We are reaching for the stars by launching our IoT satellite constellation, ensuring global coverage for seamless data transmission
